channel.title: CVE Feed for Planet Fitness -- Planet Fitness Workouts
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Planet Fitness -- Planet Fitness Workouts

item.title: CVE-2024-43201|2024-09-23T19:55:27.448Z -- planet%20fitness -- planet%20fitness%20workouts
item.description: The Planet Fitness Workouts iOS and Android mobile apps prior to version 9.8.12 (released on 2024-07-25) fail to properly validate TLS certificates, allowing an attacker with appropriate network access to obtain session tokens and sensitive information.
